about_the_game:
House Password supports Chinese and English bilingual switching, is a virtual password storage room, using Unity3D development completed. I made a small room, there are 12 items, each item can input 6 rows of text, you can call the system input method for text input, so that you can store any password and text information, and can be scattered to store passwords, and confusing encrypted and saved as an encrypted archive file, and then their own use of other compression software, will be divided into 3 or more than three compressed sub-volume, and set compression password, and finally uploaded to different companies in the network disk, at least uploaded 3 or more network disk. This can be done permanently stored, but will not leak the password. Can avoid sudden natural disasters or theft, resulting in the loss of complex passwords. For example, you can use House Password to save the passwords of digital currencies or other important passwords that can not be retrieved online.

The key archive path is in :
\House Password_Data\PasswordSave\ directory,savegame0.save, a total of 10 archives can be saved.


Decrypt:
Just download all the password archive volumes from the web disk, extract the password archive, for example :savegame0.save to
\House Password_Data\PasswordSave\

directory, and then enter House Password, load this archive, and then enter the password to unlock the 12 items of the password text, and then finally through their own set of markers to find the real password sequence. In this way, even if the hacker gets the complete key archive and decompiles it, he can't really unlock the correct password sequence, so you can save and backup your passwords in a more secure way.

How to use House Password: Search "House Password Tutorial" on YouTube.

I promise:
The software encrypted archive is permanently available and never re-sold in any form to release dlc !!!

Models and music materials within the software are used:
SMILE GAME BUILDER DLC
detailed_description:
House Password supports Chinese and English bilingual switching, is a virtual password storage room, using Unity3D development completed. I made a small room, there are 12 items, each item can input 6 rows of text, you can call the system input method for text input, so that you can store any password and text information, and can be scattered to store passwords, and confusing encrypted and saved as an encrypted archive file, and then their own use of other compression software, will be divided into 3 or more than three compressed sub-volume, and set compression password, and finally uploaded to different companies in the network disk, at least uploaded 3 or more network disk. This can be done permanently stored, but will not leak the password. Can avoid sudden natural disasters or theft, resulting in the loss of complex passwords. For example, you can use House Password to save the passwords of digital currencies or other important passwords that can not be retrieved online.

The key archive path is in :
\House Password_Data\PasswordSave\ directory,savegame0.save, a total of 10 archives can be saved.


Decrypt:
Just download all the password archive volumes from the web disk, extract the password archive, for example :savegame0.save to
\House Password_Data\PasswordSave\

directory, and then enter House Password, load this archive, and then enter the password to unlock the 12 items of the password text, and then finally through their own set of markers to find the real password sequence. In this way, even if the hacker gets the complete key archive and decompiles it, he can't really unlock the correct password sequence, so you can save and backup your passwords in a more secure way.

name: House Password

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200u
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 220 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA　GeForce GTX 1050 同等以上
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: This is a virtual password storage room where any password can be stored and backed up securely and encrypted.
